descriptionHtml:
Mage Backpack
by TumbaJamba & DVAted

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/Ywhtm.png[/img][/url][/center]
GUYS IF YOU LIKE MY MOD PLEASE DONT FORGET TO ENDORSE, TO GIVE FEEDBACK AND POST YOUR SCREENSHOTS=)))))


____________
Description:
This mod brings you a unique lore-friendly backpack in the world of Skyrim. But be careful - the only way to acquire it is dangerous and exciting.

The backpack is craftable at any tanning rack but it requires a special ingredient you can only find after defeating a new creature: the Mud Monolith.

The backpack\'s enchantments are +70 carry weight and +15 magic resistance. It uses body slot 47.

[youtube]1bfRqYtHq3k[/youtube]
____________
Location:
Go find the new note on the safe in the Archmage\'s Quarters in Winterhold College.

____________
Installation/Uninstallation:
Copy the files from this archive in your data folder and activate the provided .esp in your load order./Deactivate the provided .esp from your load order and remove the files from your data folder.

____________
Permission:
Don\'t share or use the models provided here without my express permission.

____________
Credits:
Tumbajamba for the models of the backpack and mud monolith.

Special thanks to DVAted for beeing a good friend and for implementing my models in to the game. Tx Bro!
author: TumbaJamba and DVAted
